title: Nero 2017 Platinum v18.0.06100
description:
http://www.nero.com/enu/products/nero-platinum/?vlang=us



Activation (keys are in txt file)
---------------------------------

- Disable internet connection.

- Remove previous Nero version.

- Install Nero with installation key.

- Choose what you want to install: 'Installation settings' or install ALL if you want to.

- Reboot.

- Open Nero Control Center and remove installation key.

- Add retail key.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- If Nero still asks for activation use 'patch', copy 'patch' to intallation directory, run and hit 'patch'.
 
https://someimage.com/15YLJrg
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Enable internet connection.

- It works for me.

- Enjoy!


Screens:
------------- 
https://someimage.com/qDEm
